name: Paul Villangca
text: Sometimes that information is not immediately obvious. On my last build, the Palit video card I chose would not work at all with my Gigabyte motherboard. Took a fair amount of googling to find just one forum post with the same problem.    I ended up exchanging the vc for an MSI one.

source_obj.text: Sometimes that information is not immediately obvious. On my last build, the Palit video card I chose would not work at all with my Gigabyte motherboard. Took a fair amount of googling to find just one forum post with the same problem.    I ended up exchanging the vc for an MSI one.
